summaries: An experienced software engineer with **15+ years** in full-stack development, having led teams of **8+ engineers** and business units of **50+ members** to take multiple products from **prototype to GA** and scale them to **millions of active users**.
Proven ability to **rapidly prototype** and **launch products** while **optimizing performance** in high-scale production environments serving millions of users.
Currently, I am actively building, learning, and contributing to AI systems through local hackathons and research on emerging protocols such as **MCP and A2A**.

Coding.expert: Full Stack Generalist, TS/JS, Java, Node, SQL (Postgres, MySQL, DynamoDB).

descriptions: Built multiple voice and text agents in collaboration with OpenAI, Google Gemini and Anthropic. Contributed to development of A2A and MCP.

Over a dozen services from prototype to GA with full observability, scaling, security, and production infrastructure in high-availability cloud/native environments. Proficient in Docker/Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, Buildkite), and monitoring stack (DataDog, Prometheus, Grafana).

bullets: Developed and shipped Twilio AI Assistant, with custom Knowledge and Tools.
Collaborated with OpenAI and Google Gemini on several product launches as demo partner, resulting in 1 patent, 3 publications, and partnership inquiries from major tech companies.
Built internal tooling with numerous frameworks, including LangChain, Lakera, Galileo, Prompt Foo, FireCrawl.
Developed confidential 3-5 year Horizon 3 projects (under NDA) to build Twilio's next billion-dollar product arm.
Assisted as a 'loan architect' to different teams to help design their new products and help with cross-team collaboration.
Designed and built the degraded fallback system model for Twilio Flex product.
Architected Twilio Flex’s next-gen execution engine with Temporal (1,000+ steps/sec; 5× more than Studio throughput), resulting in published patent (US 2023/0351290 A1).
Improved the Twilio Flex edge service reliability by eliminating weekly incidents, achieving near-zero downtime over one year.
Developed a company-wide gameday model, improving service resiliency.
Improved Twilio Flex edge service performance to 1k+ req/sec, vastly outperforming Twilio's API edge service.
Developed and released a series of developer tools announced at Twilio Signal, including Functions & Assets, Studio, TwiML Bins, Debugger and API Explorer.
Led the GAing of Twilio Studio and assisted with GAing of Twilio Functions & Assets.
Designed and developed the customization engine of the SaaS Twilio Flex.
Led modernization effort to React; developed a front-end deployment pipeline, streamlining company-wide front-end development.
Designed and manufactured portable computer with battery for remote cellphone diagnostics by field technicians. Device shipped with custom Linux OS that booted twice as fast as vanilla Debian.
Developed dashboard for remote monitoring, OTA updates and device management of the computers.
